channel.title: performance on fn:join
channel.description: Recent content in performance on fn:join

item.title: 10x Faster Spring Boot Startup Times
item.author: contact@fnjoin.com (Salman Malik, Archie Cowan)
item.description: Applications based on spring-boot are not known for extremely fast startup times and low memory usage. Usually spring-boot application are meant for long running backend processes and we have learned to live with the startup time and higher memory usage. This is because leveraging spring-boot solves so many other problems for the developer and speeds up the overall development process. In other words, we are OK with more developer productivity at the cost of higher resource usage at runtime specially at application startup.
